(a) After which baker do diminishing marginal returns begin for Zhizhi’s Bakery? Explain using numbers.

(b) Assume Zhizhi’s Bakery sells its baked goods in a perfectly competitive market at a price of $5 per unit. Calculate the marginal revenue product of the fifth baker. Show your work.

(c) Zhizhi's Bakery hires bakers in a perfectly competitive labor market for bakers at a wage rate of $36 per hour, and the market price of baked goods remains $5. How many bakers will Zhizhi’s Bakery hire to maximize its profit? Explain using marginal analysis.

(d) Assume there is an increase in the demand for baked goods in the market. What will happen to each of the following?(i) The market wage rate. Explain.(ii) The marginal revenue product curve for Zhizhi’s Bakery. Explain.
